message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! It's a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
I'm interested in the product, but $180 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to consider a price of $120?
I understand that $180 is a bit steep for you, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer it to you for $150.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $150 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, but I'm still willing to negotiate. I can offer it to you for $140. This is my best price, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $140 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?
I've already offered you $140, which is my best price. However, I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer it to you for $135. This is as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to make one more concession, but $135 is still a bit high for me. Would you be willing to consider a price of $130?

I've already made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any lower than $135. However, I'm willing to throw in some extras to sweeten the deal. I'll include a free accessory that's worth $20. So, the total value you'll get is $155. I'm not willing to go any lower than this.
I appreciate the extras you're offering, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $132.50. If you're willing to accept this price, I'll take the deal.
